Translations.Text: vellezine yuhaccune fi-llahi mim ba`di me-stucibe lehu huccetuhum dahidatun `inde rabbihim ve`aleyhim gadabuv velehum `azabun sedid
allahu-llezi enzele-lkitabe bilhakki velmizan. vema yudrike le`alle-ssa`ate karib
yesta`cilu bihe-llezine la yu'minune biha. vellezine amenu musfikune minha veya`lemune ennehe-lhakk. ela inne-llezine yumarune fi-ssa`ati lefi dalalim be`id
allahu letifum bi`ibadihi yerzuku mey yesa'. vehuve-lkaviyyu-l`aziz
men kane yuridu harse-l'ahirati nezid lehu fi harsih. vemen kane yuridu harse-ddunya nu'tihi minha vema lehu fi-l'ahirati min nesib
em lehum surakau sera`u lehum mine-ddini ma lem ye'zem bihi-llah. velevla kelimetu-lfasli lekudiye beynehum. veinne-zzalimine lehum `azabun elim
tera-zzalimine musfikine mimma kesebu vehuve vaki`um bihim. vellezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati fi ravdati-lcennat. lehum ma yesaune `inde rabbihim. zalike huve-lfadlu-lkebir
